question: Who of the following become an advocacy ambassador for Swachh Aadat Swachh Bharat initiative?
explanation: Kajol has become an advocacy ambassador for Swachh Aadat Swachh Bharat initiative. Kajol has been an active supporter of eradicating preventable deaths from hygiene-related issues. She has insisted people to become "swachhta doot" and contribute to Swachh Bharat Abhiyan.
